title: Ariat Men's Rebar M4 Relaxed DuraStretch Basic Boot Cut Jean
description: BUILT TO LAST: The Rebar M4 Jeans for men are reinforced for twice the durability with just the right amount of stretch for a flexible, comfortable fit; Relaxed through the waist, hip and thigh for the most comfortable fit, all day long

PREMIUM FEATURES: These work jeans for men have no-rub comfort inseams that prevent abrasion against the skin; Other features include reinforced pockets with knife pocket feature, anchored belt loops, and heavy-duty zippers and hardware

GREAT GIFTS: Shopping for your husband or boyfriend shouldn't be difficult, and with these durable jeans from Ariat, it won't be; Perfect for work, outdoor or a night out, your hard-working man can wear these jeans for any occasion

MADE TO LAST: The special blend of materials with reinforcement gives these work pants for men maximum durability; the ToughMax denim is 2X more durable and also features DuraStretch for maximum flex, keeping you comfortable all day long

SCIENCE OF INNOVATION: Ariat excels in advanced technologies to deliver products that outperform in various conditions; Partnering with world-class biomechanical research groups and testing labs, Ariat strives to improve performance, comfort, and durability;

Rebar Jeans are built to last. With twice the durability thanks to the ToughMax denim and Durastretch for maximum flexibility, these jeans are low rise and relaxed through the waist, hip and thigh. The stackable, boot-cut design allows you to easily slip these men's work jeans over your boots and the medium wash with sanding and tacking looks worn, but sophisticated. Perfect for work on a construction site or on the farm, you won't be disappointed with the men's Rebar M4 Low Rise jeans with Durastretch.No matter what you need, there’s an Ariat product made for you. Ariat works with global suppliers to develop new material that is lighter, cooler and more durable than anything else in the market. Every product, from hiking and work boots to western casual wear and English riding gear, gets field tested with people like you, enabling us to consistently raise the bar for functionality and style.Ariat is committed to building a different breed of company, one that reflects our core values as a team and those of our consumers. Our company values have shaped our success since 1993 ― a commitment to innovation, quality, integrity, teamwork and respect.
